title: Surprise sculptures: The artist behind "Microsafari" explains the tiny new creatures in the galleries
Fantasy Coffin
description: Imagine you’re dead (sorry), and a crowd has gathered for your funeral. They will bear your body through the streets in a unique coffin built to herald your wealth, status, and community standing. Now here’s an important question: exactly what coffin design would you want them to choose as a symbol of your profession or personality? Perhaps a larger-than-life lobster, complete with antennae and claws? Hey, it’s your funeral.

title: A World Cup tribute: art from around the globe
